post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
Purpose Statement

Assist in the operation, development, maintenance and support of COG’s SharePoint
infrastructure. Assist in maintaining operating efficiency of COG’s websites and providing support
relating to data replication, business intelligence and database integrity, demonstrating effective
use of the SharePoint platform and performing administrative duties.

General Accountabilities
. Provides support to end users by performing tasks such as responding to queries and
helping in the use of COGonline. Works with others to investigate hardware and software
problems relating to SharePoint.
. Troubleshoots and resolves problems with COGonline & the SharePoint farms.
Helps with administering and safeguarding the security and integrity of data residing on the
SharePoint servers, with installation of current patches, SP, and updates.
. Assists in assessing client requirements and proposes solutions.
. Assists with the introduction, development, implementation of new websites, workflows &
business intelligence.
. Demonstrates the effective use of COGonline. On occasion, delivers informal courses
related to COG websites to others.
. Performs administrative functions for COGonline, including search catalogues, data
replication to satellite servers at member locations, inventory of software licenses
(webparts)

. Perform backups on SharePoint databases & their websites.
. Produces/updates documentation on application systems, functions, to facilitate systems
development and implementation activities.
. Conducts assigned tests to ensure systems operate as expected; identifies and resolves

operational problems.
. Keeps abreast of Microsoft SharePoint developments and updates
. Performs other job duties as required.

Competencies, Skills, Experience

Core:
. IIS 6/7
. Windows Server 2003/2008
. DNS (Name Resolution)
. TCP/IP & other network considerations
. SQL Server 2008 Advanced Administration (Backup, Monitoring)
. Basic Firewall rules
. Performance Monitoring
. Workflow (Windows Workflow Foundation)
. Client Troubleshooting & Support: IE, Firefox, Safari, Office XP, 2003, 2007, etc...
. HTML & Client side scripting (Javascript, AJAX, DHTML, XSL, XSLT, XHTML)
. Exchange and SMTP integration (Inbound and Outbound email including contact objects)
. High Availability: Windows Network Load Balancing
. Single Sign on integration
. Connection Monitoring & Troubleshooting (ADO.NET, Web Services, CDO)
. Global Deployments - Multi farm deployments
. Dev, Production - Staged deployments
. Virtualization – VMWare Server 2.0
. Linux web technologies (incl: MySQL, Apache, UBBThreads, PHP)

Solutions:
. Internet Publishing
. Intranet Departmental Dashboard Portal (Team Sites)
. Business Process Management
. Extranet Collaboration
. Document Management
. Search Center or Intranet and Internet Search Solutions
. Remote employee solutions
. Web 2.0 Solution: Blogs, Wikis, Social Networking (Profiles & My Sites)

Extended:

. AD (Group Policies, Security Groups, DLs, Contacts, authentication, and attributes for profile
import)

. Desktop Management (IE settings, Office deployment, storage and collaboration
considerations)

. Antivirus management solutions like Forefront & Symantec Protection

. Presence Integration (LCS, Office Live Communication Server, SMTP and SIP)

. Understanding and supporting Dev: ASP.NET, web.config, web parts, web part connections

. Migration Skills: Public Folders, NTFS File Structures

. AvePoint DocAve 5.1 Replication software

Interoperability and Integration:
. Office Interoperability (Word, Excel, Access, PowerPoint, Outlook)
.Infopath forms troubleshooting and basic design skills (XML, HTML)
.SharePoint Designer for workflows, CSS, Design, etc...
. Reporting and Analysis Integration: SQL Reporting Services, SQL Analysis Services
. Business Data Catalogue and Excel Services
. Web Services integration
. Search/Indexing Integration
. Single Sign on solutions and integration with client certificates, smart cards, and 2 factor auth
. Bamboo Solution’s webparts installation & license management.

Deadline for submissions – 2010 April 14

If you have any further questions about working enviroment or any benefits, email here:chilhoank@yahoo.ca
Do not forget to use the email address for your resume!!
post.title: Sharepoint Administrator
